BEFORE:
mu, logvar = self.encode(x.view(-1, 784))
        z = self.reparameterize(mu, logvar)
        return self.decode(z), mu, logvar
AFTER:
encoded = self.encoder(x)
        mu = self.mu(encoded)
        logvar = self.sigma(encoded)
        if self.mode == 'train':
            z = self.reparameterize(mu, logvar)
        else:
            z = mu
        output = self.output(self.decoder(z))
        return output, mu, logvar
